short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage quick notes directly in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fleet is the fastest way to capture fleeting thoughts, ideas, and reminders right in your browser. Whether it's a song title, a to-do, or a name you don't want to forget, Fleet lets you jot it down instantly without disrupting your workflow. No need to open your main note-taking app like Notion or Evernote, or clutter your to-do list - just open Fleet, type, and save. Perfect for moments when you just need to capture something quick so you donâ€™t lose track later on.
